name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On October 4, the European Court of Justice ruled that Afghan women are eligible for asylum.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On October 5, at BYD's Jinan factory, a worker was suddenly crushed to death by a robot while working.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On the evening of October 10, some netizens took photos showing that there were still a large number of special police stationed in Jiefang Pavilion.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On October 10, Mr. Xu from Guangyuan, Sichuan Province, posted a video saying that when his mother was undergoing surgery at Guangyuan City Hospital of Traditional Chinese Medicine, Dr. An from the hospital's cardiovascular department asked the patient's family for a 3,000 yuan cash red envelope. One month later, Dr. An claimed that the money was "expert fees" and insulted Mr. Xu over the phone, calling him "mentally ill." After the incident was exposed, the hospital's leaders called Mr. Xu and said they could return the 3,000 yuan, but he had to delete the online video, but Mr. Xu refused.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On October 10, the Shenzhen Traffic Police Detachment summoned "Lin Xiaoyu" to be investigated for suspected provocation. Lin Xiaoyu is a motorcycle blogger who was recently subjected to irregular and fishing enforcement by the police. The traffic police arbitrarily seized Lin Xiaoyu's motorcycle without sufficient evidence, and tried to fill in Lin Xiaoyu's name by using tricks, which was suspected of fishing enforcement. It is reported that for a long time, many motorcycle fans, including Lin Xiaoyu, have been speaking out on the Internet, using the law to prove the unreasonableness of Shenzhen's ban on motorcycles.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On October 9, a Douyin blogger posted a video about Xiaohongshu’s suspected theft of personal privacy. The blogger said that among the “people you may know” on Xiaohongshu registered with a foreign mobile phone number, there were actually WeChat friends.
